description:
In-game clip from Star Citizen Alpha 2.6.1.
This version is 21:9 3440x1440 @ 60fps.
It's a 18 MB, 90 second clip that loops seamlessly.

Alternate Versions:
-------------------------------------
16:9 1920x1080 60fps version:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=880584606

16:9 2560x1440 60fps version:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=880529650

21:9 3440x1440 60fps version:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=880323286

4:3 1920x1440 60fps version:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=880560868

-------------------------------------

Based on a screenshot I had taken called "Penthouse View in Area 18":
https://flic.kr/p/LiFi4J

ReShade was used to apply:
- Deband
- Filmgrain
- FXAA
- Levels
- Vibrance
